Title: Shuruaat Ka Interval
Director: Aarti S. Bagdi, Amrit Raj Gupta, Krishan Hooda, Shishir Jha, Atanu Mukherjee, Rukshana Tabassum, Ankit Tripathi, Palash Vaswani
Writer: Aarti S. Bagdi, Amrit Raj Gupta, Krishan Hooda, Shishir Jha, Atanu Mukherjee, Biswapati Sarkar, Rukshana Tabassum, Ankit Tripathi, Palash Vaswani, Gautam Ved
Actors: Avidant Bhagat, Kaivalya Chheda, Rajsekhar Aningi, Bramha
Plot: An anthology of 8 short films around the theme of "Interval", mentored and curated by Imtiaz Ali, Vikas Bahl, Vikramaditya Motwane and Anand Gandhi.
